News.headline: Match Officials: Dover Athletic vs Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Officials: Dover Athletic vs Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Dover Athletic vs Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggers' Vanarama National league away fixture against Dover Athletic has been named as Dean Treleaven.
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Mark Lucie and Aaron Moody with the fourth official being James Whittaker.

Ticket information for the game can be foundÂ here.
